document.masterDocTitle: A review of South Korean Alloplasta Förster (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae: Banchinae) with description of a new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A review of South Korean Alloplasta Förster (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae: Banchinae) with description of a new species

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Meniscus plantarius nigripes Meyer, 1930: 173
. Lectotype : ♀ , TL: Russia , TD: ZI.
